chapter.title: Troubleshooting
chapter.para: If you're having trouble, there are lots of resources you can turn to.

listitem.para: The official MongoDB IRC room is irc.freenode.net/#mongodb. This is the fastest way to get help.
MongoDB's mailing list is a good (and usually very fast) way to get answers to questions.
Found a bug? Want a feature? Have a question? File it in the PHP driver's bug tracker.

chapter.para: You can make the driver log all kinds of error messages as E_NOTICE level PHP error messages. Have a look at the MongoLog for an example.
